Title: Canyon Flowers
Plot:
A food bank delivery man is found buried up to his neck in a backyard.

Crews disregards the FBI's warning and confronts Mickey Rayborn about his role in the conspiracy that put Crews in jail.
GuestStars: Andre Johnson, Jessica Dunphy, Marshall Allman, Mary Gross, Tim de Zarn, Michael Raymond-James, Rachel Miner, Troy Bishop, Michael J. Silver, Moira Squier, Mark Weiler, Joseph Kim, William Atherton, Craig Tsuyumin
